message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115.
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further and sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $118?
I'm getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $122.
I'm almost there, but I can do $119. Can we meet at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $121.
I'm really close to the price I'm willing to pay. Can we meet at $120?
